attributes.action: Stop politicians getting £22,000 perks for second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We don't find it fair that we have to foot the politicians perks, no one should be allowed to have a perk of £22,000 to furnish a second property.
This goes to all poloticians, in government no matter which party they are in.
I earn less than £22,000 per annum and yet my bills keep rising but I get no perks to that extent.
As from this moment in time, all poloticians should have this perk revoked and it should go to pay the police and to sort out roads and nhs, and all members of the public should get a rebate on their council tax.
What the government has done, is no shorter than rob the poor to keep for themselves and in the real world that is nothing more than theft.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
